# Introduction



### A01-RC Detailed Dataset

The following analysis utilizes the Restrictive Confinement Detailed Dataset (A01RCDD) maintained by the Service Management and Oversight Branch of Ontario's Ministry of the Solicitor General [@Ontario_SOLGEN_DataOnInmatesOntario_2025; @Ontario_SOLGEN_RC_DetailedDataset_2025]. This administrative data collection tracks all restrictive confinement placements in Ontario's adult correctional system, including segregation practices and associated demographic information.

The dataset is publicly accessible through the Ontario Open Data portal [@Ontario_SOLGEN_DataOnInmatesOntario_2025] and can be queried programmatically via the CKAN Data API [@Ontario_CKAN_API_2025]. Data collection follows protocols established under the *Jahn v. Ontario* settlement agreement [@Ontario_JahnSettlement_2025] and relevant provincial legislation [@Ontario_MCSCS_Act; @Ontario_Correctional_Services_Act].
